Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Incredible! So glad we found this place - lovely ambience, friendly staff, relaxing music and delicious food. We had the sharing platter for starters and would order it again anytime! The no chicken waffles were on point, and the Injera my ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We had an amazing experience at this restaurant. The food was super delicious, spicy and full of flavour. I especially loved the injera (savoury Ethiopian pancake), the best one I have found in the Netherlands until now. We also enjoyed the relaxed and cosy atmosphere and the lovely staff. 10/10, thank you so much!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Tasty food! Perfect if you are craving for a full meal. We got share platters, the no- chicken strips with BBQ were delicious. We also got dessert- brownies and a duct cake which was amazing. Prices are good overall for 3 platters, dessert and drinks was ‚Ç¨54.50 for two! A good value for money

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
Lovely looking place, polite staff, interesting menu.
Great place to go for a vegan bite. Excellent choices for kids and plenty "junk food" options on the menu.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Very recommended to order the kapsalon! Difficult to find the vegan version of this Dutch traditional meal, thank you for making it real for vegan people! Yummmmmm

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: They had the best vegan fried chicken and Oreo milkshake I've ever had. You cannot tell it's vegan. I've craved good vegan fried chicken for 4 years. Thank you, chef and staff üëèüëèüëè

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
‚ÄúBB with Q‚Äù was really boring in both look and taste. For 13 euros I would have expected a bit more than some beans and vegetables to garnish.
The burger had way too much barbecue sauce but good consistency. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The food was okay, nothing special.  Unfortunately, not even that much good can be said about the service.  Not only was she moving in slow motion, but she was making fun of customers behind their backs.  You need to be more careful next ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Nice restaurant where to eat homemade food. The business is run by two people that take the orders, cook and serve you. It may take a bit to be served during pick hour but is is worth the wait. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: I'm not a vegan; but excellent, tasty food. I really enjoyed the injera, and the kapsalon looked and smelled good as well

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Awesome restaurant with very good vegan burgers, starters and desserts. I simply loved it. They also have meals, but I didn't try them. It's also not expensive for Amsterdam standards (10~15).

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Super cosy, great food ranging from burgers to no-chicken waffles, and awesome dessert!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Hands down the best (vegan) burgers I've ever eaten. Highly recommend. Also the desserts are yummy and the staff is very nice.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
Staff was slow, 2 different waiters who clearly didn't have experience
,  unorganized, and we ordered three dishes but 1 dish showed up. We had to order later when we found out that 2 dishes weren't even processed. We ordered again ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: I was pleasantly surprised. Just wauw! A M A Z I N G food! Definitely recommend! Its all freshly made. Everything is vegan and super tasty. It's a good thing I don't live in Amsterdam cause I would spend all my money here hehehe.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Lovely service, both main dishes we had were filling and had amazing flavours, the desserts were delicious, indulging and beautifully made. For drinks I highly recommend the Captain's Kambucha.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Very yummy vegan burgers! But wait is pretty long (we waited for around 45 minutes) as they are quite popular with deliveries, so come earlier if you want to have a quick bite!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The venue is quite small and tight. Great decor. Food is super flavorful and well executed! Definitely gives the nostalgic vegan versions of shakes and burgers!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We were lucky to have a table without reservation, but you should make one to be sure. Delicious food and drinks!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Excellent restaurant. Love the setup, the atmosphere and most of all the food. It's a very nice location in Amsterdam with a great walk towards Rembrandt Plein. The staff was very nice and the prices are very reasonable. Great experience!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
The chicken burger was delicious, loved the house made coleslaw
First time I've had a vegan chicken burger and not at all disappointed & the loaded fries was seriously good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: I tried the Caribbean Burger, very great!!! And the garlic source tastes delicious! The service is very cool and friendly. We will come back!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Hands down my favourite vegan restaurant in Amsterdam! The food will blow your mind, especially the buffalo solider with its incredible blue cheese sauce. Have only done takeout because of the pandemic but the staff are friendly, service is ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Absolutely loved this place! Super friendly staff, amazing food, enjoyable music and all in all a great experience. Our starter was a bit late, therefore we got another one for free, which was super kind, but not necessary. We were happy ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: You are on a city trip in Amsterdam and you are vegan? (also perfect for non-vegans) You HAVE to visit this place. The red velvet cake is sooo good. And all the other dishes too! Can't wait to eat there again.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Friendly staff, great fries and the blue cheese dip that comes with the buffalo strips is amazing!!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
Lovely venue and interesting menu.
Couldn't try many options as we went only for small bites, early lunch.
But starters were delicious ! ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: 29-11-2019 first vegan experience and i must say it was great. The food the taste was great. The ppl are great go out and support.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: A ma zing food. As someone who is not vegan, mainly because i can‚Äôt leave cheeseburgers out my diet yet (i know), I was truly amazed by this vegan cheeseburger. So sensational, I enjoyed every second of it. You get a generous amount of food, and its more than just a simple burger, its richly topped and it is delicious!!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Tasty food, lovely atmosphere. Definitely worth to visit more than once. Needs to be patient about service time, but the waiters in the end of day were so lovely.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Sis @  the register could have warned me about the Buffalo strips and fries!!! Absolutely delicious! I'm from NY, and we looooove blue cheese with our wings + thick, salty 'steak' cut fries. Whew. The sauce and vegan blue cheese are everything! I'll deff be back for more when I'm feeling naughty ;-)

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great experience eating at Mooshka! The staff are super friendly and accommodating, and the food is delicious. I have tried most of the menu this stage and love everything, especially the buffalo strips. The restaurant has a great vibe too. Couldn‚Äôt recommend eating here more!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great food, top service. I was lucky I got let in without reservation so plan ahead!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great tasty food, very nice staff and atmosphere, if in Amsterdam a visit is required.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The service is great! The food is Okish, I would expect more from a vegan place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The perfect place to eat amazing  meals. They have something for everyone here: burgers, milkshakes, ethiopian Injera, Surinamese roti, everything vegan, everything absolutely delicious. The service is excellent, the location is perfect, and the atmosphere is very cozy

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great location, friendly staff, great drinks selection and most importantly, amazing food. I've eaten here many times and I haven't eaten one dish that didn't make me smile. This place makes it so easy to be a vegan. Lots of different options and inspirations on the menu. Will continue to visit regularly.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Everything was incredible. Nice people, nice music and awesome food!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great food, but service a bit on the slow side.  The food is definitely worth it though!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Everything we ordered met our expectations although the burgers are quite big/filling and none of us were able to finish our plate. I strongly recommend the bitterballs

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Amazing food and 10 star service, will definitely come back üòç

Review Text: Menu looked great, unfortunately we weren‚Äôt able to try it. There were three other groups seated when we arrived, so the staff were busy, but not overly so. We were seated and given menus, then ignored for 20 minutes. After waiting 15 ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We're not vegan but we thoroughly enjoyed the food. The Caribbean burger was super tasty, as well as the milkshakes. Very good service, especially for Amsterdam standards :D

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Vegan burgers might not be very exciting but they do these very well! The staff is also friendly and attentive. Somewhat over price for what they offer, you are looking at 17-20‚Ç¨ for a burger and fries.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
BEST VEGAN FOOD IN AMSTERDAM!!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: My friend and I used to go to Mooshka very often when it was still at the former location. The service was very slow but the atmosphere was super enjoyable, the owners just adorable and the food wonderful so we'd always patiently wait and ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We've been here several times to share Injera and a Carribean burger. Quality is consistent and delicious!! The sweet potatoes on the side are good too. This time we also had an amazing red lentilsoup as a starter. It was a big bowl filled ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: This was a great an refreshing experience. The menu was explicitly very "diverse and inclusive" but in a very relaxed way. We had the "Loaded fries" and "Roti masala", and they were delicious. Especially because we already knew them (my ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Had a great experience-  the food was soulful and good - the milkshakes were incredible and the mixed drink was strong.  I never eat ‚Äúvegan ‚Äú. But the soul was evident and the food was worth a second visit.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Fantastic food, wide selection, charming place. Thoroughly enjoyed my dinner here!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: This place is incredible! The food was amazing and the lady who owns the place was so kind and helpful, she gave us some banana cake whilst we waited for the food to be made. We had a burger and the Ethiopian injera - both were so so good! homemade, hearty and lovely vegan food -  highly recommend! xx

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We ordered via their website and had it home delivered. Delivery was really fast, half an hour or so. Food was really good too, the combination of being able to choose healthy options or junkfood really works well for us. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: This place ticked all the boxes from service, value for money and satisfaction. My friend and I ordered the burger menu and WOW it tasted AMAZING! The cheese, sauces and sweet potato fries blew my mind! Everything tasted fresh and the meal was super filling. I'd recommend anyone to com here if they are craving a burger VEGAN OR NOT!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The food was delicious. But we had to wait for a long time. And there were two guys they completely forgot about. They entered before us, but only ordered their starters when we had finished our main dish.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We came for Lunch at Mooshka for the first time yesterday & we will definitely be coming back again! The milkshakes were amazing! :)  Welcoming, friendly and excellent service. Loved it!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great food, beautiful places! Definitely recommend to go, eat and enjoy ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Was honestly the best place I've eaten on this trip to Amsterdam. Roti Wrap was full of spice and flavour, the cheesy chips likewise and the masala croquettes were the best thing I've eaten in a while. Service was excellent, staff so wonderful and friendly. Really enjoyed it

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
I've been going to Mooshka since they've opened their first restaurant. The food never fails me, and their hospitality is insanely good. If you are looking for good quality, wholesome vegan food, here it's where it's at!
Love you guys and best of luck <3

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Mooshka has great food and great service! The couple that own the restaurant were so kind; we had a great time speaking with them. My boyfriend got the burger and loved it; I got the Ethiopian pancake-- it was amazing. So flavorful, and so much food! We will definitely be coming back to Mooshka the next time we are in Amsterdam.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Awesome. Delicious food, friendly staff, a great experience.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Very good atmosphere. The food was very delicious. We tried the two kinds of burgers, both were great. The fries and the vegan mayo, which came with the burger were also really tasty. A really good place with tasty food and a nice vibe. Recommended.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The staff kept rushing us to order, the guy seemed very unhappy about being our waiter hahaha. It used to be a very cosy and nice place with a living room kind of vibe. Now it's very "ongezellig" and for the price point not the best spot. There are many vegan restaurants in Amsterdam with better service, atmosphere and prices.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: It is obvious that they‚Äôve just opened the place and have no hospitaltiy experience. Our experience started warm bottle of rose wine. You‚Äôd expect the staff would have noticed that. Afterwards the waiter took our order, checked it but still ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Had the Injera and a Chocolate Milkshake. I am happy. Nice and polite people. Places like this make me wish to move here. If there were such beautiful locations in my hometown, that would be really great. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We visited Mooshka on Saturday evening & in our opinion Mooshka is an example to other restaurants in Amsterdam of exactly what good service is! We were made to feel welcome from the moment we arrived & the waitress even made us an alcoholic milkshake that wasn't on the Menu! ;)

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: We called two times and neither calls were picked up, and we were never called back. We made a reservation online at 8pm (because it said 8pm was an available time slot) and got an email that that our reservation was "waiting to be ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: One of the best Vegan restaurant's I've been to! Amazing burgers and mylkshakes, and great variety with ethiopian, asian, cakes etc. (all equally delicious). Great vibe with welcoming staff, had a good laugh with them and they were very accommodating. I 100% recommend to all vegans and non-vegans alike.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Delicious and cool selection of vegan foods!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Went for lunch and loved the mediterranean  burger and nachos!  We split a vanilla donut which we had high hopes for, but it had pink frosting and tasted a bit stale.  But everything else was delicious!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: I like it :) need to try more food next time. thank you!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The food was ok. We were disappointed because they didn't have anymore chicken and waffles, and the food was ok tasting. Probably too pricey for quality. Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Tried to eat here but was advised I could not as I was alone and that only tables of 2 or more were accepted ‚Äúbecause of corona‚Äù. Literally the opposite of the government is recommending. there was plenty of space available and the staff claims that this is their corona rule and kicked me out.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Very nice place. Service was great and the food was amazing

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Such a nice welcoming atmosphere for simple but delicious vegan food. We had the soup which was made with sweet potato, plantain and  casave.  Was so filling and warming.  I also had a strawberry milkshake that I'd return to the caf√© for on ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Fantastic place. Staff was friendly and attentive. Food was great. Awesome tastes. Interior might not always be to everyones liking but it gave us a warm feeling. Definitely coming back.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Whether you are vegan or not, the grub at Mooshka is first class. So tasty! We had the Caribbean burger and the injera. Staff every bit as friendly as other reviewers mentioned. We went on the hottest day of the year (decade) and after ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: TRIED eating here twice now. I placed a reservation through the website, got an e-mail they would contact me about a table. Never got contacted. When you call them, the phone rings a couple of times and you get a voice mail. This happened ‚Ä¶

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Visiting from the U.S. Delicious meal. My husband and I shared the bitter balls, cheese stick special, no chicken wrap, and flaming seitan wrap. Would definitely recommend.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text:
Always a treat at Mooshka!!!

They also bake a mean Brownie, Velvet or Carrot cake.. Weight-watchers beware, because you will be hooked after just one bite!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: This is one of the nicest vegan comfort food restaurants I've ever been to! The food is amazing, lovely service, great milkshakes and very welcoming and cosy atmosphere

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Great vegan restaurant! Tasty food and lovely service! I recommend it!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: The Injera by Mooshka is just great. It's so tasty you don't even want to leave the tiniest bit untouched. Spicy, just fantastic. And the people who run this place, so kind, enjoy your delicious meal!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Superb food! Can't believe I didn't know this place before: everything on the menu is vegan, but soooo tasty and for such good prices. The service was amazingly friendly and fast. Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Boring food , small place,packed during corona, had food to share there a while ago,which was a plate of different Currys,served on a sour pancake ,which was terrible, the young girl working there had no clue what she was doing,lack of hospitality, we also orderd rum & ginger which took ages to arrive.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Lovely little place in de pijp offering homemade foods You can't find anywhere else in the city! come Hungry, leave Happy!! Our Family Favorite in Amsterdam! Family Recipes Family Owned! get something with the Garlic Sauce or try one of ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Yummy food + cocktails, lovely staff!

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Saying the food was "good" is an understatement. In times of the beyond meat hype this place shows what delicious self-made burgers should taste like. Hope to be back soon.

Name: Mooshka
Review Text: Good service, great food, we loved it. Don't miss the lemon cheescake!
